formatted_address: 1 Joo Koon Cir, #03-25 FairPrice Joo Koon, Singapore 629117
name: Fu Wei Chicken Rice

reviews.text: On Sunday 13 April 2025, I had the chicken rice with braised egg and tofu for my lunch at the Kopitiam food court at FairPrice Hub in Joo Koon, and I liked this meal as the chicken rice with braised egg and tofu tasted very delicious. Overall, the service provided to me was very good and I would love to try these other chicken dishes from the other Fu Wei Chicken Rice outlets in the future.

vicinity: 1 Joo Koon Circle, #03-25 FairPrice Joo Koon
